tasks.label: Install dependencies
tasks.command: powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -NoProfile -Command "& { if (Test-Path .\.venv\Scripts\Activate.ps1) { . .\.venv\Scripts\Activate.ps1 }; if (Test-Path .\requirements.txt) { pip install -r requirements.txt } elseif (Test-Path .\pyproject.toml) { pip install -e . } else { Write-Output 'No requirements.txt or pyproject.toml found'; } }"

tasks.label: Run tests (pytest)
tasks.command: powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -NoProfile -Command "& { . .\.venv\Scripts\Activate.ps1; if (Get-Command pytest -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue) { pytest } else { pip install pytest; pytest } }"
